content: DWLF hardening complete. System integrity verified for high-frequency integration.
Updated Mission Control timezone to UTC+1. Global Roster and Dashboard now aligned with William's local time.
Initialized 'Autonomous Deployer' cron job to force GitHub syncs every 10 minutes. Zero friction between development and production.
DASHBOARD DYNAMIC SYNC COMPLETE: Tasks and Squad status now mirror WORKING.md in real-time. Parsing Inbox, In Progress, and Done sections dynamically.
TECHNICAL VERIFICATION: Verifying live DOM updates for the new Live Strategy Feed. Sub-step: Injecting dynamic JSON feed into grid-cols-4 and testing refresh intervals.
OPTIMIZING: Refining the 0.5% arbitrage threshold. Analysis indicates latency slips are eating 15% of projected alpha; adjusting execution buffer for cross-chain lag.
